horoscopes.general: Courageous, determined, confident, enthusiastic, optimistic, honest, passionate.
horoscopes.work: Natural leaders, assertive, goal-oriented, willing to take risks.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Adventurous, passionate, affectionate, and sometimes impulsive.
horoscopes.money: Bold in financial ventures, prefers to invest in high-risk, high-reward opportunities.

horoscopes.general: Reliable, patient, practical, devoted, responsible, stable.
horoscopes.work: Persistent, hardworking, enjoys security and stability in the workplace.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Loyal, romantic, values long-term relationships and physical affection.
horoscopes.money: Prudent with finances, prefers saving and investing in safe, tangible assets.

horoscopes.general: Gentle, affectionate, curious, adaptable, ability to learn quickly and exchange ideas.
horoscopes.work: Excellent communicators, versatile, thrives in dynamic and flexible work environments.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Charming, playful, values intellectual connection, and enjoys variety.
horoscopes.money: Resourceful, enjoys multiple income streams, can be impulsive with spending.

horoscopes.general: Tenacious, highly imaginative, loyal, emotional, sympathetic, persuasive.
horoscopes.work: Dedicated, works well in supportive roles, values work-life balance.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Nurturing, protective, deeply emotional, seeks security and loyalty.
horoscopes.money: Cautious with finances, prefers saving for future security, values financial stability.

horoscopes.general: Creative, passionate, generous, warm-hearted, cheerful, humorous.
horoscopes.work: Confident leaders, thrives in roles with visibility and recognition.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Romantic, affectionate, seeks admiration and loyalty in relationships.
horoscopes.money: Generous with finances, enjoys luxury and spending on loved ones, confident investors.

horoscopes.work: Detail-oriented, excels in analytical and organizational roles.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Devoted, values communication and intellectual connection, sometimes reserved.
horoscopes.money: Practical with finances, careful planners, prefers stability and detailed budgeting.

horoscopes.work: Skilled negotiators, excels in roles requiring teamwork and diplomacy.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Romantic, values harmony and partnership, seeks balance in relationships.
horoscopes.money: Balanced approach to finances, enjoys spending on aesthetics and social events.

horoscopes.general: Resourceful, brave, passionate, stubborn, a true friend.
horoscopes.work: Intense and focused, excels in investigative and research roles.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Deeply passionate, values loyalty and emotional connection, sometimes possessive.
horoscopes.money: Strategic with finances, enjoys investing in transformative and growth-oriented ventures.

horoscopes.general: Generous, idealistic, great sense of humor.
horoscopes.work: Thrives in dynamic and adventurous roles, values freedom and exploration.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Adventurous, seeks intellectual and physical connection, values independence.
horoscopes.money: Optimistic with finances, willing to take risks for potential high rewards.

horoscopes.work: Ambitious, excels in leadership and managerial roles, values structure.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Committed, seeks long-term relationships, values stability and loyalty.
horoscopes.money: Prudent and disciplined with finances, long-term planners, values financial security.

horoscopes.work: Innovative thinkers, excels in roles involving creativity and social change.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Independent, values intellectual connection, seeks unconventional relationships.
horoscopes.money: Unconventional approach to finances, enjoys investing in futuristic and innovative ventures.

horoscopes.general: Compassionate, artistic, intuitive, gentle, wise, musical.
horoscopes.work: Creative and empathetic, excels in artistic and healing roles.
horoscopes.love_relationship: Romantic, seeks deep emotional and spiritual connection, very compassionate.
horoscopes.money: Intuitive with finances, prefers spending on creative and charitable causes.
